tool_description: Horoscope API - Professional Horoscopes as a simple JSON API - Access 12 horoscopes every day, written by professional astrologers. Important: Only Portuguese (PT) language is currently available.
name: Horoscope API
title: Horoscope API

api_list.name: Get a daily horoscope
api_list.description: Get a daily horoscope for the horoscope sign.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://horoscope-api.p.rapidapi.com/pt/aquario"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horoscope-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://horoscope-api.p.rapidapi.com/{langid}/{signid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horoscope-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
